localProof.headline: Where to Find Us in Odessa
localProof.directions: We are conveniently located at 4101 E 42nd Street, right near Music City Mall and just a short drive from Ratliff Stadium (home of Friday Night Lights fame). If you are taking I-20, use Exit 121 toward Music City Mall for easy access.

productLinks.headline: Financial Services Available in Odessa
productLinks.intro: Odessa and Permian Basin residents trust Ace Payday Loans for fast, transparent financial solutions. We understand the unique needs of oil field workers and offer flexible services:

services.name: Payday Loans
services.description: Short-term loans to cover unexpected expenses until your next paycheck

services.name: Cash Advances
services.description: Quick access to cash for emergency situations

services.name: Installment Loans

services.name: Title Loans

services.name: Check Cashing
services.description: Cash your paycheck or personal check instantly

services.name: Online Payday Loans
services.description: Apply from home and get funded fast

services.name: Same Day Loans
services.description: Get approved and funded within hours

services.name: Bad Credit Loans

stateCompliance.headline: Understanding Payday Loan Laws in Texas
stateCompliance.content: Odessa residents in Ector County are protected by Texas lending regulations administered by the Office of Consumer Credit Commissioner (OCCC). Texas allows payday loans through licensed Credit Access Businesses (CABs), and Ace Payday Loans is fully licensed and compliant.
keyPoints: Texas allows payday loans through licensed Credit Access Businesses (CABs) regulated by the OCCC
There is no state cap on interest rates or CAB fees - typical APRs range from 400% to 700%+
You have the right to cancel your loan within 3 days of signing without penalty
Lenders cannot threaten criminal prosecution for non-payment (except for fraud)
Your wages cannot be garnished for payday loan debt under Texas law
Your home (if declared homestead) is protected from debt collection
Always verify your lender is licensed at occc.texas.gov before borrowing
stateCompliance.regulatoryBody: Texas Office of Consumer Credit Commissioner (OCCC)

warningBox.title: Important Cost Warning
warningBox.content: Payday loans in Texas are among the most expensive in the nation. A typical $300 loan can cost over $1,000 in fees alone, resulting in APRs exceeding 700%. Consider alternatives such as credit union loans, payment plans with creditors, or nonprofit credit counseling before taking out a payday loan.

stateCompliance.disclaimer: This information is provided for general educational purposes only and should not be construed as legal advice. Payday loan laws and regulations change frequently. For the most accurate and up-to-date information, contact the Texas OCCC at (800) 538-1579 or visit occc.texas.gov. If you need legal advice, please consult with a licensed attorney in Texas.

reviews.name: Jake M.
reviews.text: Work in the oil field and needed cash between checks. The Odessa location was fast and professional. They understood my pay schedule and worked with me.

reviews.name: Sarah L.
reviews.text: Great experience at the 42nd Street location. Staff was friendly and explained everything. Got approved same day and the process was smooth.

reviews.name: Miguel R.
reviews.text: Convenient location near Music City Mall. Quick service and honest about the costs. Would use again if needed.

nearbyLocations.headline: Also Serving Nearby Cities
nearbyLocations.intro: Cannot make it to our Odessa location? We also serve:

faq.question: Where is your Odessa location?
faq.answer: Our Odessa branch is located at 4101 E 42nd Street, Suite 215, near Music City Mall. Take I-20 Exit 121 for the quickest route.

faq.question: What are your hours in Odessa?
faq.answer: We are open Monday through Friday 9 AM to 7 PM, and Saturday 10 AM to 4 PM. We are closed on Sundays.

faq.question: Do you work with oil field workers with irregular pay schedules?
faq.answer: Yes, we understand that many Permian Basin workers have variable pay schedules. We work with your specific pay cycle to create a repayment plan that fits your situation.

faq.question: Do I need an appointment at the Odessa branch?
faq.answer: No appointment needed. Walk-ins are welcome during business hours. You can also apply online first to speed up the in-store process.

faq.question: What do I need to bring to the Odessa location?
faq.answer: Bring a valid government ID, proof of income (pay stub or bank statement), and an active checking account. For title loans, also bring your vehicle and clear title.
